Header.title: Ontario's best paint services
Header.paragraph: You dream of painting and then we paint your dream

About.paragraph: AU Painting and Renovations inc is best among the best paint service providers, had been helping Trontonians and Canadians to the best of its abilities for more than 12 years. We have created a family not clients.We provide clean , efficient and quick paint services. We had achieved so many awards togethor, awards in terms of more work by our AU Painting happy family members, 5 start rating on HomeStars and many more.
Why: More than 12 years of proven industry experience
Assign painters in less than 2 business days for you project
Why2: Reliability and speed is our key to success
We are known for our Cleanliness and dapperness
We treat customers as our families

Services.name: Residential
Services.text: We have interior paint specialists, who not only offer free colour consultations, but also offer  clean and qick services for our AU family all over Toronto. AU home painting services include: interior wall, trim, door and ceiling painting, condominium painting, cabinet spray painting, popcorn ceiling removal, wallpaper installation and removal, staircase painting and refinishing and drywall installation and repair.

Services.name: Commercial
Services.text: Does your business environment need a serious makeover? AU Painters is proud to offer commercial painting services that will not only amplify your office or large scale business with tremendous new interior painting colours, but our affectionate and personable team of professional painters will come in quickly, do their work professionally and cause minimal disruption to your business establishment.

Services.name: Stucco Removing
Services.text: At AU Painters,We understand why you want to get rid of your dusty and outdated ceilings and enjoy a new look and feel in your home. We’ve helped hundreds of homes with popcorn ceiling removals done professionally and with 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed , Seamless, painless and fast.

Services.name: Dry Way Sealers
Services.text: Asphalt seal coating and driveway sealing is the process by which a thin layer of specialized asphalt sealer is laid over a paved surface to increase the durability and longevity of the surface.INCREASE YOUR PAVEMENT’S LIFE EXPECTANCY,IMPROVE THE APPEARANCE OF YOUR PAVEMENT and most importantly SPEED-UP SNOW AND ICE MELT

Services.name: Deck and Fence Painting
Services.text: At AU Painters, we know how much the exterior of your home means to you. That’s why we have included deck painting and fence staining in our home painting services. Our experienced exterior house painters take pride in their deck staining and fence painting expertise, and also guide you with color consultations which would be suitable according to your budget and will also enhance the beauty of you home.

Services.name: HandyMan
Services.text: Do you have a small project that requires a reliable handyman but you can’t find anyone to fulfill these specific requirements? Not only do we provide excellent home painting services, but we also have professional handyman on staff, full equipped to help with your small projects with specific requirements, particularly related to interior painting, exterior painting, fixing door jambs as well as casings or wainscoting, wood trim repair, repairing staircases and banisters and hardwood flooring.

Testimonials.text: Their communication is great and overall finish is very high quality
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Smith

Testimonials.text: Our interior was done on time and very neatly. Great Job
Testimonials.name: Jagmeet Singh
